SPK Compiler API Documentation

0.1

Overall

For the top down conceptual documentation, click here.

The code are organized in the following directory structure: 

    spkcompiler -+- autogen.sh
                 +  configure.ac
                 +  Makefile.am
                 +  README
                 +  AUTHORS
                 +  NEWS
                 +  INSTALL
                 +  ChangeLog
                 |
                 +- spkcompiler    -+-  (common components)
                 |                  +-  Makefile.am
                 |                  +-  nonmem               -+- (NONMEM specific components)
                 |                                            +- Makefile.am
                 |
                 +- tests          -+-  common               -+- (unit tests for common comp)
                 |                  |                         +- Makefile.am
                 |                  |
                 |                  +-  nonmem               -+- (unit tests for NONMEM comp)
                 |                                            +- Makefile.am
                 |
                 +- doc            -+-  spkcompiler.xml
                                    +-  spkcompiler.cfg
                                    +-  Makefile.am
                                    +-  html                 -+- index.html
                                                              +- ...

Build & Installation

Step 1: Configure

    [r2/src/apps/spk/aspk/spkcompiler] $ ./autogen.sh
autogen is a bootstrap script that ultimately executes configure and generates Makefile's. This script is needed to be executed only for the first time after you checkout the module or only after when configure.ac was modified.

configure.ac has an extra option as well as standard options provided by the autoconf system. 

    [r2/src/apps/spk/aspk/spkcompiler] $ ./configure --enable-release-build
--enable-release-build option is for building SPK Compiler with full code-optimization and with no debug information. By default, it builds with no code-optimization and with debug info.

Step 2: Make

    [r2/src/apps/spk/aspk/spkcompiler] $ make
Running "make" at this level builds all the compiler, unit tests and documentations. If you are interested in only building, for example, the compiler, change directory to "r2/src/apps/spk/aspk/spkcompiler/spkcompiler" and run make.

Step 3: Install

    [r2/src/apps/spk/aspk/spkcompiler] $ su
    [r2/src/apps/spk/aspk/spkcompiler] $ make install
The compiler, spkcompiler, is intalled into /usr/local/bin/spktest/.

Usage

    Usage: spkcompiler SOURCE_XML DATA_XML

    SOURCE_XML --- an SpkSourceML document
    DATA_XML   --- an SpkDataML document

Bug:
The search facility on this page is not working. The webserver (i.e. "webserver" in RFPK) on which this documentation is installed must be equipped with PHP version 4.1.0 or higher.
